22.eng-name: Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Uqbah bin 'Amir al-Juhani:My sister took a vow to walk on foot to the House of Allah (i.e. Ka'bah). She asked me to consult the Prophet (ﷺ) about her. So I consulted the Prophet (ﷺ). He said: Let her walk and ride

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ رَأَى عَلَيْهِ كَفَّارَةً إِذَا كَانَ فِي مَعْصِيَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: The View That Atonement Is Necessary If A Man Vows To Disobey Allah
